title: UDL-Based Language Learning Programs for Autistic Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Providing a personalized language learning environment integrating UDL and mobile applications to improve communication, time management, and attention in autistic learners.

learning_goals: Learners can apply appropriate linguistic expressions in various communication scenarios with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations.
Learners can establish time management and learning plans using mobile applications and implement execution plans with over 90% adherence.
Learners can understand and reconstruct language learning content with over 75% accuracy using multiple means of representation based on UDL principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
